Missoula.Mount Jumbo: Mount Jumbo (Salish: 'Sin Min Koos,' which translates into 'obstacle' or 'thing in the way') is an iconic mountain that overlooks the city of Missoula, Montana. The mountain is northeast of the city’s downtown and, in its majority, is publicly owned. In 1996, Jumbo was purchased from private landowners and protected from development.
